name: Congruence and similarity from sequences of transformations

skills.name: Identify a sequence of transformations that produce similar shapes (US)
Identify a sequence of transformations that produce congruent shapes (US)

Both shapes here are squares with angles of 90‚Å∞, but the side length of orange is 2, and green is larger (2.8 using Pythagoras' theorem). This means they are similar but not congruent, so only Tom is correct.
